description: Add team members, manage permissions, and control account settings. Collaborate effectively while maintaining security and control.

key_features.title: Team Invitations
key_features.description: Easily invite team members by email and manage their access to different parts of your account. Role-based permissions ensure everyone has appropriate access levels.

key_features.title: Permission Control
key_features.description: Set different access levels for team members - from full Admin access to limited Member permissions. Maintain security while enabling collaboration.

key_features.title: Activity Monitoring
key_features.description: Track what team members are doing with activity logs and audit trails. Know who made changes and when for complete transparency.

key_features.title: Account Settings
key_features.description: Manage general account settings, security preferences, notification settings, and other account-wide configurations from a central location.

how_it_works.title: Send Team Invitation
how_it_works.description: Enter the team member's email address and select their role (Admin or Member). They'll receive an invitation email to join your account.

how_it_works.title: Team Member Accepts
how_it_works.description: The invited team member creates their account or signs in with their existing Prompt Reviews account to accept the invitation.

how_it_works.title: Collaboration Begins
how_it_works.description: Team members can immediately access your account based on their assigned permissions and start collaborating on review management tasks.

best_practices.title: Use Role-Based Access
best_practices.description: Assign appropriate permission levels to maintain security while enabling effective collaboration. Not everyone needs full admin access.

best_practices.title: Regular Access Reviews
best_practices.description: Periodically review team member access and remove inactive users. Keep your team list current and secure.

best_practices.title: Enable Two-Factor Auth
best_practices.description: Require two-factor authentication for all team members, especially those with admin privileges, to enhance account security.

best_practices.title: Document Processes
best_practices.description: Create clear guidelines for team responsibilities, review response procedures, and escalation processes for consistency.
